EeveeMod:Covet.NAME: Covet
EeveeMod:Covet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL !M! percent chance to gain a relic or potion

EeveeMod:ExampleTwoAmountPowerCard.NAME: Two Amount Power
EeveeMod:ExampleTwoAmountPowerCard.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Strength and !EeveeMod:m2! Dexterity.

EeveeMod:InlinePowerDemo.NAME: Inline Power
EeveeMod:InlinePowerDemo.DESCRIPTION: Strikes deal !M! more damage. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: additional damage. At the end of your turn, gain #b

EeveeMod:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.NAME: Cool Card Stuff
EeveeMod:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.DESCRIPTION: Choose from 1 of 3 cost 0 cards from any class. NL Add it into your hand. NL It gains Ethereal and Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to add into your hand with Ethereal and Exhaust.

EeveeMod:EasyXCostDemo.NAME: Easy X Cost
EeveeMod:EasyXCostDemo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Gain X Strength. NL Exhaust.
EeveeMod:EasyXCostDemo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X+1 times. NL Gain X+1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

EeveeMod:EasyModalChoiceDemo.NAME: Easy Modal Choice
EeveeMod:EasyModalChoiceDemo.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Draw !M! cards or gain !EeveeMod:m2! Strength.

EeveeMod:EVTraining.NAME: EV Training
EeveeMod:EVTraining.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: NL Gain !M! Strength, NL  Gain !M! Dexterity, NL Or Gain !!EeveeMod:m2 Evasion.

EeveeMod:DrawAndShiv.NAME: Draw and Shiv
EeveeMod:DrawAndShiv.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Add 1 *Shiv into your hand.

EeveeMod:TwoTypesOfDamage.NAME: Two Damage Values
EeveeMod:TwoTypesOfDamage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you're Vulnerable, deal !EeveeMod:sd! damage instead.

EeveeMod:StartupBlockCard.NAME: Startup And AOE
EeveeMod:StartupBlockCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Startup: Gain !M! Block.

EeveeMod:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallback.NAME: Previews and Callbacks
EeveeMod:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallback.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle *Smite and *Safety into your draw pile. NL Draw 1 card. NL If it's Colorless, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
EeveeMod:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallback.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle *Smite and *Safety into your draw pile. NL Draw 1 card. NL If it's Colorless, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
